Multiple Tukey tests

tukey_various.Rd

Perform multiple Tukey tests using all levels of the categorical variables

tukey_various(dataset, kpi, categorical)

Arguments

dataset

Specify the dataframe
kpi

Specify the kpi variable (Must be included in the dataframe)
categorical

Specify a vector of categorical variables (Must be included in the dataframe)

Details

  • It returns a dataframe with multiple comparison of Tukey's range test on all levels of the categorical variables.

  • Anova returns the statistical significance of at least one level has significant difference in variance.

Examples


library(tidyverse)

t <- tukey_various(iris, "Sepal.Length", c("Species"))
t

#>                           Vars  diff       lwr       upr        p adj Variable
#> Species.2     virginica-setosa 1.582 1.3382273 1.8257727 2.997602e-15  Species
#> Species.1    versicolor-setosa 0.930 0.6862273 1.1737727 3.386180e-14  Species
#> Species.3 virginica-versicolor 0.652 0.4082273 0.8957727 8.287558e-09  Species
